title: Finding the Sacred in the Profane, on Christianity & Pagan Objects with Father Andrew Stephen Damick
description:
Ever since I heard Orthodox priest, Father Andrew Stephen Damick quote GK Chesterton, "It's only Christian men who protect even pagan things", I had to know more. The following conversation goes into the meaning of that statement. Thank you so much for coming on my show Father Andrew, I thoroughly enjoyed our chat.

Thx for watching and pls subscribe!

Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Finding-the-Sacred-in-the-Profane--on-Christianity--Pagan-Objects-with-Father-Andrew-Stephen-Damick-e18o8lm

Purchase Father Andrew's latest book here: https://store.ancientfaith.com/arise-o-god/

listen to his podcasts here: https://podcasts.apple.com/ca/podcast/the-lord-of-spirits/id1531206254
https://podcasts.apple.com/ca/podcast/amon-s%C3%BBl/id1454179854

Follow me on twitter @andrealynnlewis
follow my vintage instagram @vintage_bangs
